name: LearningGodot
description:
Use Arrow-Keys to dodge the monsters and get points every second surviving.

Over time I will will use this basic game which I created from a tutorial  to explore the game engine Godot and some graphics design. You can follow the progress on my dev.to blog, the first articles are coming soon.

This game will get:

  • Highscore System
  • Mobile Support
  • New AI logic
  • A way to defend against monsters
  • New graphics
